method.text: Cut bacon into 2 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>2</sub> cm wide strips.
Heat butter and oil in a frying pan. Add bacon and onion. Cook for 2-3 min on high heat or until beginning to colour. Add apple slices and sugar and cook for 2 min.
Turn down heat and cook for 10 min, turning apples over to allow them to colour. The apples should be tender but not mushy. Season to taste and serve.
